metadata.description: The location in which the Azure Storage resources should be deployed.

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| summarize failedRequests = countif(substring(resultCode, 0, 1) == '5'), totalRequests=count()
| extend reliability= strcat(toint((totalRequests - failedRequests)/todecimal(totalRequests) * 100 * 1000) / todecimal(1000), "%")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let scanExecutionTargetTime = 30;
customEvents
| where name == "ScanTaskCompleted"
| extend scanExecutionTime = todouble(customMeasurements.scanExecutionTime)
| summarize RequestsMetTarget=countif(scanExecutionTime <= scanExecutionTargetTime) , TotalRequests=count()
| extend Performance=strcat(round(RequestsMetTarget/todecimal(TotalRequests) * 100, 2), "%")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let dataset=requests
| where client_Type != "Browser" 
| extend OperationName=operation_Name;
dataset
| summarize Count=sum(itemCount), AvgDuration=avg(duration), (50thPercentile, 95thPercentile, 99thPercentile)=percentiles(duration, 50, 95, 99) by OperationName
// calculate duration percentiles and count for all requests (overall)
| union(dataset
| summarize Count=sum(itemCount), AvgDuration=avg(duration), (50thPercentile, 95thPercentile, 99thPercentile)=percentiles(duration, 50, 95, 99)
| extend OperationName="Overall")
| order by Count desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let functionalTestEvents = customEvents
| where name == "FunctionalTest";
let lastCompletedRun = functionalTestEvents
| where customDimensions.testContainer == "FinalizerTestGroup"
| top 1 by timestamp desc nulls last
| project runId = customDimensions.runId, releaseId = tostring(customDimensions.releaseId), key=1;
let lastStartedRun = functionalTestEvents
| top 1 by timestamp desc nulls last
| project runId = customDimensions.runId, releaseId = tostring(customDimensions.releaseId), key=1;
let runId = toscalar(lastCompletedRun
| join kind=fullouter lastStartedRun on key
| project value = tostring(iff(isnotnull(releaseId) and releaseId == releaseId1, runId, runId1)));
let relevantTestEvents = functionalTestEvents
| where customDimensions.runId == runId;
let completeTestRuns = relevantTestEvents
| where customDimensions.logSource == "TestRun"
| project testContainerName = tostring(customDimensions.testContainer), testName = tostring(customDimensions.testName), result = tostring(customDimensions.result), releaseId = customDimensions.releaseId, timestamp;
let completeTestContainers = relevantTestEvents
| where customDimensions.logSource == "TestContainer"
| project testContainerName = tostring(customDimensions.testContainer);
let testContainerNames = functionalTestEvents
| where customDimensions.source == "BeginTestSuite"
| top 1 by timestamp
| project testContainerName = split(tostring(customDimensions.functionalTestGroups), ",")
| mv-expand testContainerName
| project testContainerName = tostring(testContainerName);
testContainerNames
| project testContainerName, testName = "Additional tests", result = "incomplete"
| join kind=leftanti completeTestContainers on testContainerName
| union completeTestRuns
| where testContainerName != "FinalizerTestGroup"
| sort by testContainerName

inputs.name: PartSubTitle
inputs.value: Results for most recent test run

content.PartSubTitle: Results for most recent test runs
